Class: MediaPad

kwsMediaApi/core~ MediaPad

<abstract> new MediaPad()

A :rom:cls:`MediaPad` is an elementÂ´s interface with the outside world. The data streams flow from the :rom:cls:`MediaSource` pad to another element's :rom:cls:`MediaSink` pad.

Methods

getMediaDescription(callback) → {module:kwsMediaApi/core~MediaPad}

Obtains the description for this pad. This method does not make a request to the media server, and is included to keep the simmetry with the rest of methods from the API.
